channel.title: Changing Prices
channel.description: I need help setting the sell price and setting the buy price on items can anyone help me?

item.title: Changing Prices
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

go to items.cfg and go to ur item u want and tehn heres an example

item = 1137 Iron_med_helm A_medium_sized_helmet. 69.7139835407442 69.7139835407442 77.430820528713 0 0 0 -3 -1 4 5 3 -1 4 0 0 the first number is teh shop sell price the 2nd number is the low alch price and the 3rd is the high alch all the other numbers are bonuses

but answerâ€¦ change the first number so if i changed 69.7139835407442 to 1.0 it would coust 1 gp from teh store rather then 69gp

Read full topic
